      • PPController

        public PPController(PPView view,
                    java.lang.String folderPath,
                    java.lang.String assetPath,
                    java.lang.String worldPath)
             throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Constructs the PPController object according to the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        view - Represents the view that the game is displayed
        folderPath - Specifies the folder that assets are saved in
        assetPath - Represents the name of the assets file
        worldPath - Represents the name of file that the world is saved in
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - thrown if the underlying structures couldn't be accessed
